title: Jar And Cover, ca. 1825–35
provenance: Shreve, Crimp and Lowe, boston; 1965 Phelps Warren
description: Round bowl on faceted waisted stem and thick square base; sides of bowl cutwith arched panels of strawberry diamonds, fans between, each, a row of vertical fluting above to lip, domed cover with flattened conforming panels of strawberry diamonds and fluted rim.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover, ca. 1825–35.
ca. 1825–35. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-179-a,b.
